course_title: Special Topics:African Studies: Writing to Transgress
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 4 / Seats Avail: 4Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
(Same as FREN 314 1)
(This course is designed to teach students the vocabulary and analytical techniques necessary for the study of cultural artifacts, including poetry, prose, drama, and selected visual materials. Prerequisite: FREN 310W or by permission. Taught in French.)
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
